name: Into the Abyss (itch) (6toad games)
description:
Underwater terrain generator, made for the 2021 ProcJam. https://itch.io/jam/procjam/rate/1315530

Might later be used for an actual game.

Controls:
  • Move : awsd or arrow keys
  • Dive : shift (up) and ctrl (down)
  • Pan Camera : right click + drag
  • Zoom Camera : mouse scroll
  • Switch camera view : c
  • Toggle Landform Visualization: v
  • Toggle Surface Scanner : b
  • Toggle Mini Map : m
